NK050(wi)012:2: na mo lo ke shwa r+aa ya /
NK050(wi)012:3: sgrol ma 'khor ba kun sgrol ba //
NK050(wi)012:4: de la gus pas phyag 'tshal nas //
NK050(wi)012:5: bstod pa'i rgyud don cung zad bshad //
NK050(wi)012:6: bgegs rnams ma lus zhi bar mdzod //
NK050(wi)012:7: de la rgyud 'di ni rnal 'byor bla na med pa yin la //
NK050(wi)012:8: de las kyang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud do //
NK050(wi)012:9: de la rigs drug las rdo rje rta mchog ste rta'i rgyal po'i rigs so //
NK050(wi)012:10: de las kyang rigs kyi 'khor lo'i dbang phyug ma bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud de /
NK050(wi)012:11: bstod pa 'di yang rgyud cha tshang ba kho nar bzhed do //
NK050(wi)012:12: de la tshigs bcad dang po phyag 'tshal sgrol ma
NK050(wi)012:13: myur ma dpa' mo zhes pa la sogs pa la
NK050(wi)012:14: / phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa dang por 'byung ba
NK050(wi)012:15: ni brjod pa gleng slong ba'i gzhir bzhag pa ste
NK050(wi)012:16: 'og ma rnams la'ang shes par bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:17: gang la phyag 'tshal na bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma la'o //
NK050(wi)012:18: de nyid kyi khyad par ji lta bu zhe na /
NK050(wi)012:19: thugs dmigs pa med pa'i snying rje chen pos myur
NK050(wi)012:20: du sems can gyi don mdzad pas ma dang 'jigs
NK050(wi)012:21: pa thams cad las skyob par dpa' ba mo ni
NK050(wi)012:22: nus mthu thogs pa med pa'i phrin las dang /
NK050(wi)012:23: skad cig gcig la ye shes kyi spyan glog dang 'dra ba myur du skyod pas /
NK050(wi)012:24: shes bya mtha' dag gzigs pa'i mkhyen pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:25: de'i phyir sgrol ma ste sems can thams cad 'khor ba las sgrol ba'i phrin las can no //
NK050(wi)012:26: de ltar na mkhyen pa dang brtse ba dang nus pa dang phrin las te /
NK050(wi)012:27: de tsam bstan pas mtha' yas pa'i yon tan thams cad mtshon nus pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:28: de lta bas tshig gnyis po de ni thams cad kyi mdor bstan yin par shes par bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:29: de lta bu'i yon tan mnga' ba'i lha mo 'di ni /
NK050(wi)012:30: 'jig rten gsum gyi mgon po spyan ras gzigs kyi
NK050(wi)012:31: zhal ras kyi chu skyes te pad+ma ge sar bye
NK050(wi)012:32: ba las thul zhing byung ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:33: 'di la lo ts+aa ba nam mkha' bzang pos /
NK050(wi)012:34: 'jig rten gsum mgon zhal gyi chu skyes /
NK050(wi)012:35: bye ba'i ge sar las ni byung ma /
NK050(wi)012:36: zhes pa 'gyur bcom pa go bde ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:37: sgra ji bzhin pa ma yin pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:38: 'jig rten gsum mgon chos kyi sku /
NK050(wi)012:39: de las byung ba ni gzugs kyi sku'o //
NK050(wi)012:40: tshigs bcad gnyis pa phyag 'tshal ston ka'i sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:41: ston ka'i zla ba kun tu gang ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:42: nya gang ba brgya phrag ni brtsegs pa'am spungs pa'i
NK050(wi)012:43: 'od zer dang mtshungs pa'i zhal las rab tu dngas
NK050(wi)012:45: skar ma stong phrag mang po tshogs pa rnams kyi
NK050(wi)012:46: sde lta bu'am du mar gyes pas rab tu phye
NK050(wi)012:47: zhing 'phro ba'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar ba'i sku
NK050(wi)012:48: can ma ste / sku mdog dkar zhing dngas la yid 'phrog cing 'od zer dkar po 'phro ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:49: sbas don ni ston zla lta bu'i byang chub kyi
NK050(wi)012:50: sems nor bu nas spyi bo'i bar 'pho med du
NK050(wi)012:51: brtsegs pa dang / rtsa phran thams cad kun das gang ba ni skar tshogs lta bu'o //
NK050(wi)012:52: tshigs bcad gsum pa phyag 'tshal gser sngo sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:53: gser gyi yu ba can me tog sngo ba chu
NK050(wi)012:54: las skyes pa'i pad+mas phyag rnam par brgyan pa ste
NK050(wi)012:55: phyag na bsnams pa'i lha mo khyod ni sbyin pa
NK050(wi)012:57: dka' thub ste tshul khrims dang /
NK050(wi)012:58: zhi ba ste shes rab dang /
NK050(wi)012:59: bzod pa dang bsam gtan te pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mnga' brnyes pas /
NK050(wi)012:60: phar phyin ni khyod kyi spyod yul nyid yin la /
NK050(wi)012:61: lha mo khyod ni de la spyod pa mo'o //
NK050(wi)012:62: sbas don ni chu skyes gang ba'i pad+ma dang /
NK050(wi)012:63: phyag gi sgras rdo rje ste mnyam par sbyar ba
NK050(wi)012:64: las 'pho ba med pa'i tshul khrims dka' thub dang
NK050(wi)012:66: stong nyid rtogs pas rnam rtog zhi ba'i shes rab dang /
NK050(wi)012:67: de las mi 'da' ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
NK050(wi)012:68: bde sdug thams cad de'i ngang du snyoms pa'i bzod pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:69: bdag 'dzin btang ba'i sbyin pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:70: sngags kyi spyod pa bstan pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:71: tshigs bcad bzhi pa phyag 'tshal de bzhin sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:72: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gtsug gtor las /
NK050(wi)012:73: phan yon mtha' yas pa dang ldan zhing mi mthun
NK050(wi)012:74: pa'i phyogs thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed
NK050(wi)012:75: pa'i rig sngags kyi ye shes sprul pa de /
NK050(wi)012:76: dge ma khyed kyis bdag gir mdzad nas longs spyod de /
NK050(wi)012:77: sems can dpag tu med pa'i rig sngags des mdzad la /
NK050(wi)012:78: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ma lus par thob pa'i /
NK050(wi)012:79: rgyal ba'i sras po sa bcu'i dbang phyug rnams kyis kyang nyid la gus pas brten cing mchod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:80: zab don la lugs 'byung lugs bzlog gi dga' ba'i sa ni /
NK050(wi)012:81: dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing //
NK050(wi)012:82: de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid //
NK050(wi)012:83: ces pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:84: khams dang rlung gi tshogs pa gtsug tor du thim
NK050(wi)012:85: pas spang bya mtha' yas pa las rnam par rgyal
NK050(wi)012:86: zhing / phar phyin bcu ste rlung bcu gnas gyur pas /
NK050(wi)012:87: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' ste mig sogs skye mched rnams kyang ye shes su gnas gyur pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:88: 'di dang gong gi ston zla sogs sbyar bas ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag go //
NK050(wi)012:89: tshigs bcad lnga pa phyag 'tshal tut+ta ra sogs la
NK050(wi)012:90: tut+t+aa re dang h+aum gi sngags kyi sgras 'jig rten
NK050(wi)012:91: 'dod khams kyi gnas thams cad dang /
NK050(wi)012:92: nam mkha' ste gzugs khams gzugs med kyi gnas dang /
NK050(wi)012:93: phyogs zhes pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad kyang /
NK050(wi)012:94: khyab cing gang bar mdzad la 'jig rten bdun po
NK050(wi)012:95: zhabs kyi 'og tu mnan pa ltar dbang du mdzad
NK050(wi)012:96: cing / khyod kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rig sngags kyi mthus /
NK050(wi)012:97: dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha chen po
NK050(wi)012:98: rnams kyang bran du 'gugs pa'i nus mthu yod na
NK050(wi)012:99: / phra mo gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos /
NK050(wi)012:100: de la 'jig rten bdun zhes pa snod bdun dang /
NK050(wi)012:102: snod bcud bsdams pa'i bdun la sogs pa'i 'chad tshul mi gcig pa mang yang /
NK050(wi)012:103: 'dir ni mthu dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten bdun te /
NK050(wi)012:104: gru dang yi dwags dang lha ma yin dang /
NK050(wi)012:105: mi dang rig pa 'dzin pa nang mi'am ci dang lha'i 'jig rten no //
NK050(wi)012:106: sbas don ni tut+t+aara ni gdung ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:108: h+aum gi yi ge ni mi shigs pa'i sgra ste gtum mo las byung ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:109: 'dod pa ni gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang /
NK050(wi)012:110: phyogs ni dbu ma'i nang ste sgra des gang ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:111: nam mkha' gang ma ni brjod bral lo //
NK050(wi)012:112: 'jig rten bdun ni rtsa 'khor lo lnga dang /
NK050(wi)012:113: me rlung gi 'khor lo gnyis te bdun gtum mo 'bar ba zhu ba'i kun das gang ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:114: kun da de nyid ma lus par yang gsang ba nas spyi bo'i bar du 'gugs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:115: tshigs bcad drug pa phyag 'tshal brgya byin sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:116: brgya byin lha'i 'gro ba rnams kyi rgyal po'o //
NK050(wi)012:117: me lha ni drang srong gi gtso bo'o //
NK050(wi)012:118: tshangs pa 'jig rten gyi byed por 'dod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:119: rlung lha ni 'jig rten gzo'i gnas dang bkod pa'i khyad par byed pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:121: drang srong nyi ma'i mdog dang /
NK050(wi)012:122: ph+y+aa la sogs pa byed po'am dbang du phyug tu grags pa sna tshogs pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:124: 'jig rten na ches che bar grags pa de rnams kyis kyang /
NK050(wi)012:125: mchod pa'i gnas su gyur cing /
NK050(wi)012:126: 'byung po ni tshogs kyi bdag po la sogs pa bgegs dang logs par 'dren pa rnams so //
NK050(wi)012:127: ro langs ni ro langs kyi las byed pas las kyi ming byed pa ba la btags pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:128: lha'i srin po'i rig sngags kyi mthu grub pa /
NK050(wi)012:129: rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa'i 'jigs byed dgu la sogs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:130: dri za ni sna tshogs shing rta la sogs pa rnams dang /
NK050(wi)012:131: gnod sbyin ni rnam thos bu la sogs pa gter gyi bdag po rnams dang /
NK050(wi)012:132: mdangs 'phrog pa'i lha ma srin rnams te /
NK050(wi)012:133: gdul bar dka' ba'i tshogs de rnams kyis kyang /
NK050(wi)012:134: khyod kyi mdun nas bstod par byed pa ste 'gro ba thams cad kyis bla mar basngagasa so //
NK050(wi)012:135: sbas don ni brgya byin sogs lnga ni 'byung ba lnga ste /
NK050(wi)012:140: sna tshogs dbang phyug nam mkha' 'o //
NK050(wi)012:141: de ltar khams lnga'i drung thig ler thim pa ni mchod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:146: de dag kyang thig ler thim pa ni mdun nas bstod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:147: 'dis ni 'dzin pa'i yan lag bstan no //
NK050(wi)012:148: tshigs bcad bdun pa phyag 'tshal trata ces sogs la trata dang phata kyi gsang sngags la sogs pa /
NK050(wi)012:149: 'phags ma sgrol mas gsungs pa'i rig sngags /
NK050(wi)012:150: drag shul spyod pa rnams kyi mthu las /
NK050(wi)012:151: drag po'i las sna tshogs par phyed par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)012:152: de yang gzhan la phan pa'i phyir gdul dka' 'dul ba yin gyi /
NK050(wi)012:153: gnod pa'i sbyor ba ni ma yin no //
NK050(wi)012:154: rig sngags de lta bu'i khyad par 'ga' zhig las /
NK050(wi)012:155: pha rol po'i byad ma rnams kyi 'khrul 'khor dang sngags kyi stobs bzlog cing 'joms pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:157: g.yas bskum g.yon brkyang la sogs pa'i zhabs kyis /
NK050(wi)012:158: gdug pa can rnams mnan pa'i tshul gyis /
NK050(wi)012:159: rims dang nad yams la sogs pa zhi bar mdzad cing /
NK050(wi)012:160: khro bas 'khrugs pa'i sku las me 'bar zhing shin tu 'bar ba ston pas /
NK050(wi)012:161: gshin rje la sogs pa'i gdon rnams byer ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:162: 'gro ba rnams la srung ba chen po mdzad pa yin no //
NK050(wi)012:163: sbas don ni trata ces pa ni dral ba /
NK050(wi)012:164: phata ni 'gas pa ste rnam rtog 'joms pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:165: pha rol las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khrul 'khor dus sbyor bcu gnyis kyi rlung sogs 'gags pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:166: g.yas kyi rtsa ro ma ni skum pa ste kha steng du blta ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:167: g.yon gyi rtsa rkyang ma ni brkyang ba ste kha 'og tu blta ba yin la /
NK050(wi)012:168: de gnyis dbu ma'i zhabs kyis yongs su mnan pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:169: de gnyis kyi rlung dbu mar 'gags pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:170: de las gtum mo'i me 'bar ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:171: ham yig zhu ba'i chu 'khrugs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:172: slar yang shin tu 'bar zhing ches zhu ba la sogs pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:173: srog rtsol gyi yan lag go //
NK050(wi)012:174: tshigs bcad brgyad pa phyag 'tshal tu re sogs la tu re sogs kyi rig sngags zlos pa'i mthus /
NK050(wi)012:175: rang bzhin zhi ba'i dbyings las sgrol ma nyid 'jigs pa chen po'i skur ston par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)012:176: des ni bdud kyi dpa' bo ste dmag dpon rnams 'joms shing /
NK050(wi)012:177: zhal ras chu skyes khro gnyer dang ldan par mdzad pas /
NK050(wi)012:178: bstan pa la sdang ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:179: sems can mang po la 'tshe ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:180: sgrub pa po la bar du gcod pa'i dgra rnams gsod pa ma ste /
NK050(wi)012:181: 'chi ba'am gnod pa'i bsam sbyor med par 'gyur ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:183: bdud kyi dpa' bo 'joms pa ni phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i spyod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:184: khro gnyer ni lha'i chas su zhugs pa mtshon te /
NK050(wi)012:185: des kyang ye shes kyi sku grub pa mtshon pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:186: bde stong gnyis su med pa'i ye shes ni skal
NK050(wi)012:187: dman rnams skrag par mdzad pa'i phyir 'jigs pa chen
NK050(wi)012:188: po'o // ye shes dang ye shes kyi sku de
NK050(wi)012:189: gnyis kyis dgra bo ste sgrib pa ma lus pa
NK050(wi)012:190: po'o // bcom nas / tu re ste myur bar
NK050(wi)012:191: lam gong ma rnams bgrod nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)012:192: po'o // bcom nas / thob pa'o // 'di ni
NK050(wi)012:193: ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag gi 'bras bu kun
NK050(wi)012:194: tu 'od la sogs pa'i sa bcu gnyis so //
NK050(wi)012:195: tshigs bcad dgu pa phyag 'tshal dkon mchog sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:196: dkon mchog gsum mtshon par byed pa ut+pala'i phyag rgya ni sgrol ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ste /
NK050(wi)012:197: snyim pa kha sbyar gyi gung mo sbyar zhing mdzub
NK050(wi)012:198: mos brten nas mthe bong gshibs te rtsa bar bkod
NK050(wi)012:199: pa thugs kar gtod pas rnam par brgyan pa ni
NK050(wi)012:200: / rjes 'jug rnams kyis kyang dam tshig gi phyag
NK050(wi)012:201: rgya de lta bu cho ga bzhin du bcings na
NK050(wi)012:202: / / rig sngags kyi lhas byin gyis brlab pa'i
NK050(wi)012:203: don sngon byung la bcom ldan 'das ma nyid phyag
NK050(wi)012:204: rgya de lta bu 'ching ba'i sku'i rnam 'gyur dang
NK050(wi)012:205: / / / phyogs kyi 'khor lo ste phyogs bcu'i zhing khams ma lus pa /
NK050(wi)012:206: rang gi sku las byung ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs
NK050(wi)012:207: rab tu 'khrugs shing 'phros pas khyab cing brgyan par
NK050(wi)012:208: mdzad pa'o // de nyid rjes 'jug la ni /
NK050(wi)012:209: phyag rgya des spyan drangs na phyogs bcu'i zhing nas 'od zer 'phro zhing dngos su 'byon pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:211: dkon mchog gsum mtshon ni khu rdul rlung gsum ste /
NK050(wi)012:212: gcig tu 'dus pa sor mo gsum gyi phyag rgya
NK050(wi)012:213: lta bu de rnams rtsa 'khor lo so so'i thugs
NK050(wi)012:214: ka ste dbus kyi lte ba'i thig ler yongs su
NK050(wi)012:215: bcings pas ye shes kyi sku gtum mo'i 'od zer
NK050(wi)012:216: las grub pa phyogs kun du khyab pa thob par
NK050(wi)012:218: 'dzin pa'i stobs las rjes dran 'byung ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:219: tshigs bcad bcu pa phyag 'tshal rab tu sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:220: 'gro ba rnams rab tu dga' ba bskyed pa'i sku dang /
NK050(wi)012:221: brjid cing mdzes pas dbu rgyan gyi nor bu las
NK050(wi)012:222: 'od zer gyi phreng ba spel zhing 'phro ba ma
NK050(wi)012:223: dang / bzhad pa dang rab tu cher ba bzhad pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:224: tut+t+aa re la sogs pa'i sngags kyi sbas 'jig rten
NK050(wi)012:225: gzhan rnams dbang du byed pa'i bdud kyang khyod kyis
NK050(wi)012:227: 'jig rten gzhan thams cad kyang nus pas dbang du bsdus nas /
NK050(wi)012:228: thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa la 'god do //
NK050(wi)012:230: rab tu dga' ba lhan cig skyes pa'i gzi brjid kyi 'od zer gyis dbu la brgyan pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:231: spyi bor mas brten pa'i lhan skyes te /
NK050(wi)012:232: bzhad pa rab bzhad kyang sgra dang bcas pa'i gtum mo'i mes don no //
NK050(wi)012:233: tut+t+aara ni gdung ba ma ste gtum mo'i me'i gdung bas /
NK050(wi)012:235: 'jig rten lus ngag yid gsum bde ba chen po'i
NK050(wi)012:236: ye shes kyis byin gyis rlob cing dbang du byed
NK050(wi)012:237: pa ste / rjes dran gyi yan lag go //
NK050(wi)012:238: tshigs bcad bcu gcig pa phyag 'tshal sa gzhi sogs
NK050(wi)012:239: la lha mo gang gi rig sngags kyis sa gzhi
NK050(wi)012:240: skyong ba'i rgyal po'i tshogs sam /
NK050(wi)012:241: sa'i lha mo la sogs pa /
NK050(wi)012:242: sa 'og gi klu dang lha ma yin dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:243: mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams thams cad 'gugs shing dbang
NK050(wi)012:244: du byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan pa nyid ma'o
NK050(wi)012:245: // khro gnyer g.yo ba ste khro mo'i rig sngags h+aum gi yi ge dang bcas pa'i mthu las /
NK050(wi)012:246: 'gro ba phongs pa rnams thams cad dbul zhing phongs
NK050(wi)012:247: pa'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa las sgrol zhing zhi
NK050(wi)012:249: longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:250: gter chen po'i dngos grub la sogs rgyas par byed pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:252: sa gzhi skyong ba sa 'og gi bdag po'i sgras /
NK050(wi)012:254: gtsug tor nas nor bu'i bar du brten pa'i tshul gyis 'gugs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:255: khro gnyer g.yo ba dang h+aum gi sgras /
NK050(wi)012:256: ri bong can gyi dngas ma khro gnyer te /
NK050(wi)012:257: smin mtshams kyi thig le brgyud de /
NK050(wi)012:258: gtsug tor gyi bar du brtan pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:259: nam mkha'i mdzod la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub pa'i phyir yongs pa las grol ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:260: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag khyad chos
NK050(wi)012:261: dkar dmar gyi bgrod pa steng 'og tu 'gag tshul
NK050(wi)012:262: lo // tshigs bcad bcu gnyis pa phyag 'tshal zla ba'i sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:263: zla ba'i dum bu ni zla ba phyed pas dbu rgyan la brgyan pa las dang /
NK050(wi)012:264: gzhan yang rgyan gyis brgyan pa thams cad las 'od zer rab tu 'bar bas /
NK050(wi)012:265: phyugs bdag chen po bye ba phrag brgya'i dregs pa 'joms pa mo /
NK050(wi)012:266: lan 'ga' dka' thub can gyi skur bstan nas /
NK050(wi)012:267: ral pa'i thor tshugs 'chang ba'i khrod na de bzhin
NK050(wi)012:268: gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa bzhugs shing gnas
NK050(wi)012:269: pa'i sku las / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par shin tu 'od rab byed ma ste /
NK050(wi)012:270: 'od kyi snang bas gsal bar byed pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:272: gong snga ma'i 'phros de nyid la sbyar te /
NK050(wi)012:273: zla ba'i dum bu'i dbu rgyan ni byang chub kyi sems spyi bor brtan pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:274: ral pa'i khrod gnas ni grib ma'i tshul du spyi bor brtan pa /
NK050(wi)012:275: 'od dpag med ni dmar cha'i dngas ma /
NK050(wi)012:276: de gnyis dkar la 'od zer tu 'phroo ba ni /
NK050(wi)012:277: dkar dmar de rnams stong gzugs phyag rgya chen po'i
NK050(wi)012:278: dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo mtha' yas par gyur pa'o
NK050(wi)012:279: // tshigs bcad bcu gsum pa phyag 'tshal bskal pa sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:281: 'jig dus kyi me ltar 'bar ba'i phreng ba me dpung gi dbus na bzhugs shing /
NK050(wi)012:282: nang zag med kyi dga' ba las ma g.yos bzhin du /
NK050(wi)012:283: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum sogs drag po'i stangs stabs kun
NK050(wi)012:284: nas bskor ba ste rol pa sna tshogs pas dga'
NK050(wi)012:285: ba dang / dgra bo ste mi dang mi ma
NK050(wi)012:286: yin pa'i gnod byed kyi dpung gi tshogs rnams ni
NK050(wi)012:289: gtum mo ye shes kyi me dus mtha'i me 'bar ba lta bu ste /
NK050(wi)012:290: lus dang snang ba thams cad la khyab par 'byung ba'i rgyu ni /
NK050(wi)012:293: steng 'og srog thur gyi rlung ni kun nas bskor ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:294: rtsa 'khor lo so sor re re bzhin 'byung ba lnga'i thim tshul sogs /
NK050(wi)012:295: rnam par rol ba'i rnam 'gyur dam kun nas 'byung ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:296: dga' ba zhes pas rlung rnams bde ba'i thig ler
NK050(wi)012:297: gyur pas bdud dang nyon mongs pa'i dgra dpung 'joms
NK050(wi)012:298: pa'o // tshigs bcad bcu bzhi pa phyag 'tshal sa gzhi sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:299: ri rab gling dang bcas pa'i sa gzhi chen po'i ngos la /
NK050(wi)012:300: thal mo brdabs pa'i phyag gi mthil gyis bsnun pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:301: zhabs kyis rdung ma las dang /
NK050(wi)012:302: zhal ras khro gnyer can du mdzad cing khro ba'i shugs kyis /
NK050(wi)012:303: h+aum zhes shangs nas 'jigs pa'i sgra bsgrags pas /
NK050(wi)012:304: sa 'og rim pa bdun na gnas pa'i klu dang
NK050(wi)012:305: lha min dang srin po dang yi dwags gdug pa
NK050(wi)012:306: can rnams thams cad 'gems pa mo ste dum bur
NK050(wi)012:309: sa gzhi chen po 'di nyid la /
NK050(wi)012:310: 'og tu thog phugs rim pa bdun bzhin du mi ma yin gyi yul chen po dag gnas pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:311: kha cig ni ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khong seng
NK050(wi)012:312: nas thur du gzhal ba yin zer yang mi legs
NK050(wi)012:313: par mngon no // de yang gzhi dang /
NK050(wi)012:320: sa 'og gi 'jig rten chen po rnams so //
NK050(wi)012:322: sa gzhi'i ngos ni lte ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
NK050(wi)012:323: de la gtum mo ye shes kyi me nges pa'i
NK050(wi)012:324: don gyi lha mo'i zhabs kyis brdungs pa dang me
NK050(wi)012:327: dbu ma'i mas snan tshangs pa'i me sbrul ltar 'khyil ba lan bdun pa /
NK050(wi)012:328: rab tu 'bar bar gnas pa der /
NK050(wi)012:329: gtum mo 'bar ba'i byang chub kyi sems 'ongs pa na me'i gdung ba rab tu zhi ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:330: de'i rtsa mdud rnams 'gems shing 'jig pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:331: tshigs bcad bco lnga pa phyag 'tshal bde ma sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:332: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid rtag tu bde ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:334: zhi ba'i ngang tshul can ma /
NK050(wi)012:335: mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu zhi ba /
NK050(wi)012:336: 'gog bden gyi dbyings la mnyam par 'jog pas zhi ba'i spyod yul can ma ste /
NK050(wi)012:339: pha rol gyi don du dge ba bskyed par mdzad pa ma /
NK050(wi)012:340: skal ba dang ldan pa rnams la /
NK050(wi)012:341: zhi ba'i lam ston par mdzad cing /
NK050(wi)012:342: 'bras bu mi gnas pa'i myang 'das zhi ba dam pa'i spyod yul la 'god par mdzad pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:343: gzhan yang lha mo nyid kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags
NK050(wi)012:344: s+w+aa h+aa dang dang yang dag par ldan pa dag
NK050(wi)012:345: bzlas pas / sdig pa chen po dang de'i 'bras
NK050(wi)012:346: bu sdug bsngal chen po rnams kyang 'joms par mdzad
NK050(wi)012:347: bzlas pas / pa nyid do // 'dis zhi ba'i
NK050(wi)012:348: las kyi mtha' bsgyur ba'i sngags s+w+aa h+aar bshad cing
NK050(wi)012:349: bzlas pas / pa nyid do // / gong du zlog pa la trata dang /
NK050(wi)012:350: bsad pa la phata du gsungs pas /
NK050(wi)012:351: las gzhan rnams kyi sngags kyi mtha' bsgyur ba yang zhor la 'phangs pa yin no //
NK050(wi)012:352: 'di'i nges pa'i don mthar thug pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:353: bde ma ni sor rtog ye shes /
NK050(wi)012:354: dge ma ni me long ye shes /
NK050(wi)012:355: zhi ma ni mnyam nyid ye shes /
NK050(wi)012:356: mya ngan 'das zhi ni chos dbyings ye shes /
NK050(wi)012:357: sdig pa chen po 'joms pa ni bya grub ye shes so //
NK050(wi)012:358: gsung gzhom med kyi sgra rig sngags dang s+w+aa h+aas mtshon pa mtha' yas par shar bas /
NK050(wi)012:359: sdig pa zhi ba sogs sems can gyi don mdzad pa ste 'bras bu la sbyar ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:360: tshigs bcad bcu drug pa phyag 'tshal kun nas sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:361: grub pa rig pa 'dzin pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:362: byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin dang rab tu
NK050(wi)012:363: dga' ba'i thugs dang ldan pa rnams kyis kun nas
NK050(wi)012:364: bskor zhing / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bdag po
NK050(wi)012:365: sdig to can la sogs pa sems can rnams la
NK050(wi)012:366: nye bar 'tshe ba'i dgra'i lus rab tu 'gems pa
NK050(wi)012:368: yi ge bcu pa'i ngag ste sngags kyi bkod pa las byung ba'i lha mo khyod /
NK050(wi)012:369: rig pa ste rig sngags h+aum yig las byung ba'i
NK050(wi)012:370: sgron ma 'od zer 'bar ba'i sku can nyid ma'o
NK050(wi)012:371: // 'dis ni sgrol ma khro mo la sa bon
NK050(wi)012:372: h+aum dang bsnyen pa'i sngags yi ge bcu par bstan
NK050(wi)012:374: stong gzugs phyag rgya chen po'i 'od zer gyis bskor ba'i rab dga' ste g.yo med bde bas /
NK050(wi)012:375: dgra ste ma dag pa'i snang ba'i lus 'joms par byed do //
NK050(wi)012:376: zhes pa bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang /
NK050(wi)012:377: yi ge bcu ni g.yas g.yon gyi dkyil 'khor bcu'i cha shas 'gag pa las thob pa'i rtags bcu'o //
NK050(wi)012:378: de yang yi ges rlung mtshon zhing /
NK050(wi)012:379: yi ge'i skad dod a k+shar 'gyur ba med pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:380: chos dbyings 'gyur ba med pa'i snang ba bcu'am /
NK050(wi)012:381: de mthong ba las byung ba'i bde ba mi 'gyur ba'i cha shas bcu'o //
NK050(wi)012:382: rig pa h+aum gi brdas ni /
NK050(wi)012:383: h+aum cha lnga pas ye shes lnga mtshon te ye
NK050(wi)012:384: shes lnga'i rang bzhin gyi thig le khams gsum gyi
NK050(wi)012:386: de yang rtags bcu po de dag gi chos su
NK050(wi)012:387: 'jog ste rlung dbu mar bkang ba las byung bas
NK050(wi)012:388: so // de la mnyam par 'jog pa ni don
NK050(wi)012:389: dam pa'i rig sngags chen po ste sgron ma ni
NK050(wi)012:390: stong gzugs kyi gsal snang ngo //
NK050(wi)012:391: 'di ni so sor sdud pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
NK050(wi)012:392: tshigs bcad bcu bdun pa phyag 'tshal tu re sogs kyi don ni /
NK050(wi)012:393: tu re zhes pa myur ma ste /
NK050(wi)012:394: 'gro ba'i don myur du spyod pa'i lha mos khro bo'i tshul gyis zhabs gnyis ni brdabs pas /
NK050(wi)012:395: ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /
NK050(wi)012:396: man+dara zhes bya ba'i ri dang /
NK050(wi)012:397: ri bo gangs can zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po gnas pa'i ri rnams dang bcas pa'i /
NK050(wi)012:398: 'jig rten gsum ste sa 'og sa steng sa bla rnams kyang g.yo bar byed do //
NK050(wi)012:402: gzhung 'di'i rgya skad mthong ba rnams na /
NK050(wi)012:403: kee la sha zhes par snang ste /
NK050(wi)012:404: de ltar gangs ri zhes 'don pa dang mthun mod /
NK050(wi)012:405: dpe sna tshogs pa snang ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:406: gcig tu nges bzung ba dka' bas gnyis ka ltar mi 'gal bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:407: h+aum gi rnam pa'i zhes pa h+aum ka re stee h+aum gi yi ge'o //
NK050(wi)012:408: 'jig rten gsum na zhes pa gnyis pa'i don la
NK050(wi)012:409: bdun pa'i tshig ste gsum po la g.yo ba'i byed
NK050(wi)012:410: pa 'jug pa'o // 'jig rten gsum skyod par gyur na /
NK050(wi)012:411: ri rab sogs smos pas ci zhig bya zhe na /
NK050(wi)012:412: spyir 'jig rten gsum skyod par gyur yang /
NK050(wi)012:413: lha mthu bo che dag gnas pa'i gnas kyi khyad
NK050(wi)012:414: par de rnams g.yo bar mi 'gyur ba yang srid
NK050(wi)012:415: pas / 'phags ma nyid mthu che ba'i don du smos so //
NK050(wi)012:417: ri rab ni tshangs pa'i rus pa /
NK050(wi)012:418: ri gzhan gnyis ni yid bzang dang dung can ma /
NK050(wi)012:419: g.yo ba ni byang chub kyi sems kyi yongs su gang ba /
NK050(wi)012:420: 'jig rten gsum ni steng 'og gi dbye bas rtsa gsum gsum drug go //
NK050(wi)012:422: thugs rdo rje'i rtsa a wa d+hu ti ste rtsa
NK050(wi)012:423: thams cad kyi sa bon nus pa der thim pa'o
NK050(wi)012:424: // tshigs bcad bco brgyad pa phyag 'tshal lha'i sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:426: yid kyi matsho'am rdzing bu dal gyis 'bab pa dang 'dra ba'i rnam pa can ni /
NK050(wi)012:427: dkar zhing zlum pa'i ri dwags rtags can te zla ba phyag na bsnams pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:428: de'i rig sngags ha ra zhes pa lan gnyis brjod cing /
NK050(wi)012:429: mtha' brten phugs kyi yi ge dang bcas pa'i sngags
NK050(wi)012:430: kyis brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug ma lus pa
NK050(wi)012:432: 'dis ni zla ba 'dzin pa'i sku sgoms te /
NK050(wi)012:433: sngags kyi khyad par de bzlas pas sbrul la sogs pa'i dug gso ba dang sel bar byed do //
NK050(wi)012:434: har lan gnyis brjod pa'i sngags ni /
NK050(wi)012:435: na mah t+aa re na mo ha ra h+aum ha re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK050(wi)012:436: zhes pa yin la de'i mthar sarba bi dzahsh+aan+tim ku
NK050(wi)012:437: ru phuta ces btags pa ni dug sel ba ste
NK050(wi)012:438: sgrol ma khro mo'i las sngags so //
NK050(wi)012:439: zhes pa ni rjes 'jug gi don no //
NK050(wi)012:441: lha ni lus las byung ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:442: de'i mtsho ni lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba rten kun+da dang bcas pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:443: de dang dbyer med pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ye shes zla ba ltar dri ma med pa /
NK050(wi)012:444: gang la mnga' ba ni de'i phyag na bsnams pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:445: de 'dra ba'i bde stong gnyis su med pa des ni /
NK050(wi)012:447: lam gnyis brjod pa'i brdas sgrib pa gnyis kyi nyes skyon 'phrog cing /
NK050(wi)012:448: ma dag pa'i lus kyis dug 'joms par byed do //
NK050(wi)012:449: tshigs bcad bcu dgu pa phyag 'tshal lha'i tshogs rnams sogs pa /
NK050(wi)012:450: lha'i tshogs pa ste 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rigs drug po rnams yin la /
NK050(wi)012:451: de bzhin du rgyal po ni 'jig rten 'di na
NK050(wi)012:452: dbang bsgyur ba po 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs
NK050(wi)012:454: 'jig rten du phan gnod byed pa ri'i lha dang shing gi lha dang /
NK050(wi)012:455: mtsho'i lha mo la sogs pa ni lha'i khyad par to //
NK050(wi)012:456: de rnams dang mi'am ci dbang che ba rnams kyis
NK050(wi)012:457: khyod kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la gus pas brten pa
NK050(wi)012:458: yin la / lha mo khyod kyis byin gyis brlab
NK050(wi)012:459: pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'i go cha dga' ba dang
NK050(wi)012:460: bde ba'i rgyu de kun nas bcings pa'i sgrub pa
NK050(wi)012:461: yin la / pos / lus ngag yid kyi gzi brjid kyis pha rol po'i rtsod pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:462: rmi lam ngan pa la sogs pa mi 'tsham pa thams cad sel bar byed ma'o //
NK050(wi)012:463: 'dir go cha ni bsrung ba'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:465: lha ni de ba'i sgra las de ha b+ha ba ste lus las byung ba /
NK050(wi)012:467: tshogs zhes smos pas ye shes kyi sku de yang /
NK050(wi)012:468: phung khams bcu la sogs pa rnam dag du ma dang ldan pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:469: de nyid rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po yang yin la /
NK050(wi)012:470: 'jig rten gsum gyi mchod 'os yin pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:471: lha dang mi'am ci la sogs pas bsten pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:472: de'i rgyu ni thig le'i tshogs pa 'pho med du bcings pa'i go cha'i gzi brjid kyis /
NK050(wi)012:473: 'gyur ba'i chags bral rtsod pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:474: tha mal gyi snang ba rmi lam ngan pa bcom pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:475: tshigs bcad nyi shu phyag 'tshal nyi ma sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:476: nyi ma dang zla ba 'od zer rab tu rgyas
NK050(wi)012:477: pa lta bu'i spyan gnyis po la 'od zer 'bar
NK050(wi)012:478: ba rab tu gsal ba'i gzigs pas 'gro ba rnams
NK050(wi)012:479: la yongs su gzigs pa na /
NK050(wi)012:480: ngan 'gro la sogs pa sdug bsngal can gyi 'gro
NK050(wi)012:481: ba mtha' dag bde ba la 'god par mdzad pa
NK050(wi)012:482: ste / t+aa re'i sngags lan gnyis su brjod pa /
NK050(wi)012:483: tut+t+aa re'i sngags dang bcas pa bzlas pa yis shin
NK050(wi)012:484: tu drag po ste gso bar dka' ba'i rims nad
NK050(wi)012:485: ma lus pa yang sel bar mdzad pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:486: gnas skabs su yi ge bcu pa'i sngags kyi rims nad zhi ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:488: nad 'go ba rnams bsrung bar ston la /
NK050(wi)012:489: don gyi gtso bo ni yi ge bcu pa bzlas pas /
NK050(wi)012:490: drag po'i rims nad dang 'dra ba'i nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zhi bar byed pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:491: skabs 'dir spyan gnyis nyi zla 'dra bar sbyar ba ni /
NK050(wi)012:492: spyan g.yas pa'i 'od kyis nye bar 'tshe ba rnams skrag par byed cing /
NK050(wi)012:493: sdig pa dang sdug bsngal bsreg par byed pas nyi ma lta bu'i 'od dang /
NK050(wi)012:494: g.yon pa'i 'od zer gyis tshe dang longs spyod dang bde ba stsol ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:495: bdud rtsi spro bar byed pa'i zla ba'i 'od do //
NK050(wi)012:496: t+aa ra gnyis brjod ces pa 'dis ni t+aa re
NK050(wi)012:497: gnyis dang tut+t+aa re ste gong du yi ge bcu
NK050(wi)012:498: pa'i ngag ces gsungs pa de nyid ngos 'dzin pa'o
NK050(wi)012:499: // des na t+aa re tut+t+aa re tu re s+w+aa h+aa zhes yongs su grags pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:500: sgrol ma zhi ba'i bsnyen sgrub las gsum ka'i sngags so //
NK050(wi)012:502: nyi zla'i brdas nang gi khu rdul gnyis yin la /
NK050(wi)012:503: de yis yongs su gang ba'i spyan ni dbu ma'i steng 'og gi sngags gnyis yin zhing /
NK050(wi)012:504: de las ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir 'od gsal ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:505: t+aa ra gnyis ni sgrol ba zhes pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:506: bde stong gis srid zhi gnyis kyi mtha' las sgrol ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:507: tut+t+aa ra ni gdung ba ste dka' thub yin la /
NK050(wi)012:508: nyi ma thur du gnon pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:509: zla ba gtsug tor du rengs te 'gyur med kyi
NK050(wi)012:510: dka' thub 'dis ni thig le 'pho ba'i rims nad
NK050(wi)012:511: sel ba'o // tshigs bcad nyer gcig pa phyag 'tshal de nyid gsum rnams sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:515: mthar thug gi don te bzhi'o //
NK050(wi)012:519: smon pa med pa'i de kho na nyid gsum la /
NK050(wi)012:520: gdul bya'i sems nyid yang dag par bkod pas /
NK050(wi)012:522: sgrib pa thams cad spangs te /
NK050(wi)012:524: gdul bya smin grol du byed pa'i mthu dang yang dag par ldan ma'o //
NK050(wi)012:525: gdon ni nam gru'i gdon la sogs pa gdon bco brgyad rnams so //
NK050(wi)012:526: ro langs ni ro langs kyi las te spod gtong la sogs pa'i ngan sngags rnams so //
NK050(wi)012:527: gnod sbyin ni mdangs 'phrog pa rnams kyi gnod pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:528: de lta bu'i gnod pa thams cad kyang /
NK050(wi)012:529: rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis 'joms pa nyid du byed cing /
NK050(wi)012:530: rab mchog tu re zhes pa'i sngags kyi mthu las kyang de ltar byed pa nyid do //
NK050(wi)012:531: yang na tu re ni myur ma ste /
NK050(wi)012:532: rab mchog lha mo khyod kyi gnod pa thams cad myur du 'joms pa nyid do //
NK050(wi)012:534: myur du 'joms pa'i mchog rab nyid ma zhes bcos na bade'o //
NK050(wi)012:536: sgrol ma'i skur bskyed pa'i bsam gtan la /
NK050(wi)012:537: gnas gsum du yi ge 'bru gsum gyi de nyid bkod pas /
NK050(wi)012:538: zhi ba ste bar chad srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:539: gdon gyi gnod pa la sogs pa byung ba'i man ngag kyang ston no //
NK050(wi)012:541: de nyid gsum snang ba dang mched pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:543: de dag bkod pa de rim gyi shar nas /
NK050(wi)012:544: zhi ba ste skad cig bzhis thams cad stong pa 'od gsal ba nye bar 'agro'o //
NK050(wi)012:546: ro langs te thig le dang /
NK050(wi)012:547: gnod sbyin te rnam par rtog pa rnams 'od gsal gyi dbyings su bcom pa las /
NK050(wi)012:548: rab mchog ste lha'i skur myur du bzhengs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:551: 'od gsal ba ni rab ston dang //
NK050(wi)012:552: zung du 'jug pa rab rtogs byed //
NK050(wi)012:553: rnam pa gnyis su mtha' bshad do //
NK050(wi)012:554: mtha' ni mur thug pa yi tshig /
NK050(wi)012:555: ces gsang 'dus 'phags skor ba rnams kyi rang lugs la /
NK050(wi)012:556: mthar thug gi bshad pa 'dod kyang /
NK050(wi)012:557: sbyir nas sbas don yang yod par shes par bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:559: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje 'di nyid gsum ni /
NK050(wi)012:560: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin du gdod ma nas bkod pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:561: rang bzhin gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa de'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:562: lam sgoms pas kyang zhi ba thob pa'i mthu dang yang dag par ldan pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:563: rdo rje gsum dbyer med pa'i dbyings de nyid la mnyam par bzhag pas /
NK050(wi)012:564: gdon gyi gnod pa dang mtshungs pa'i sdug bsngal dang /
NK050(wi)012:565: ro langs kyi las dang mtshungs pa'i las dang /
NK050(wi)012:566: gnod sbyin dang mtshungs pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams myur du bcom nas /
NK050(wi)012:567: rab mchog ste bde chen lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes gcig pur byed do //
NK050(wi)012:569: de ltar na rgyas bshad sgra ji bzhin pa'i tshig 'di rnams kyis /
NK050(wi)012:570: bcom ldan 'das ma sprul pa'i sku //
NK050(wi)012:571: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du ston par mdzad pa /
NK050(wi)012:572: lha'i rgyal po rnams kyi gnas dang /
NK050(wi)012:573: ri bo ta la la sogs par mngon sum du
NK050(wi)012:574: bzhugs par grags pa 'di'i dbang du byas pa'i bstod
NK050(wi)012:575: pa yin la / don gyi na longs spyod rdzogs
NK050(wi)012:576: pa'i sku dang chos kyi sku la yang bstod pa'o
NK050(wi)012:577: pa yin la / // nges don 'di rnams ni /
NK050(wi)012:578: zab lam mthar thug rdo rje'i rnal 'byor yan lag drug pa dang bstun nas bshad pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:579: de yang sgrol ma 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi mtshan nges
NK050(wi)012:580: pa'i sgos kyi 'grel pa rgya gar mkhas pas sbyar
NK050(wi)012:581: ba gnyis dang / mar me mdzad dpal gyi rgyud
NK050(wi)012:582: 'grel chen mo'i nang nas 'byung ba rnams dang mthun
NK050(wi)012:583: par phal cher bshad pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:584: de dag lam rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyi man ngag
NK050(wi)012:585: dang mi mthun pa cung zad yod pa rnams ni
NK050(wi)012:586: / rgyud kyi zab don mthar thug las brtsams nas /
NK050(wi)012:587: rgyud kyi rgyud gzhan gyis rtoogs dgos par gsungs pa ltar /
NK050(wi)012:588: bdag gis rdo rje'i rnal 'byor dang mthun par bkral lo //
NK050(wi)012:589: gzhan yang nye bar mkho ba'i rnam grangs 'di lta bu dag kyang yod de /
NK050(wi)012:590: ston ka'i zla ba sogs kyis zla ba dang sa bon las bskyed pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:591: nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa sogs kyis mngon byang lnga las bskyed pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:592: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor zhes pas lha dbang bskur ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:593: 'jig rten gsum mgon sogs kyis cho ga gsum bskyed dang /
NK050(wi)012:594: de nyid gsum sogs kyis rdo rje gsum byin gyis rlob pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:595: kun nas go cha sogs kyis skye mched rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:596: kun nas skor rab dga' ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:597: g.yas brkyang g.yon bskum kun nas skor dag'i zhes pas 'khor gyi lha tshogs te /
NK050(wi)012:599: nyi ma zla ba rgyas pa'i sogs kyis cho ga dang /
NK050(wi)012:600: rdul tshon sogs la mig gis blta ba byin gyis rlob pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:601: dbu rgyan 'od kyi phreng ba spel ma zhes pas /
NK050(wi)012:602: cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:603: yi ge h+aum gi zhes pas sngags kyi dbang bskur ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:604: zla ba'i rtse mos dbu brgyan gyis gsang dbang dang /
NK050(wi)012:605: ral pa'i khrod las 'od dpag med kyis sher dbang dang /
NK050(wi)012:606: bde ma dge ma sogs kyis dbang bzhi pa yang bstan te /
NK050(wi)012:609: 'bar ba'i phreng ba zhes pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:611: sgron ma nyid ma zhes pa rnams kyis /
NK050(wi)012:612: las bzhi dang dngos grub sgrub pa'i bsreg blugs kyang bstan zhing /
NK050(wi)012:613: dbang bskur bas na rab tu gnas pa'ang bstan pa yin no //
NK050(wi)012:614: gzhan yang sgron ma nyin zhi mtshan khror grags pa'i
NK050(wi)012:615: sgrub thabs kyang gzhung 'dis shin tu gsal bar bstan
NK050(wi)012:616: zhing / sgrub thabs nyer gcig dang las tshogs nyer
NK050(wi)012:617: gcig bstan pa shin tu grags che ba rnams kyang
NK050(wi)012:618: zhing / yin te / ha cang mang par 'gyur bas 'dir ma spros so //
NK050(wi)012:619: 'jug gi don la de'i 'og tu bstod pa'i phan yon bstan pa yin te /
NK050(wi)012:620: de la dang por rtsa ba'i sngags kyi sogs sho lo ka gnyis las /
NK050(wi)012:621: rtsa sngags kyi yi ge bcu pa'i sgo nas bstod pa de 'di nyid yin pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:622: phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa nyi shu rtsa gcig dang
NK050(wi)012:623: ldan pa'i bstod pa yang 'di yin no zhes pa
NK050(wi)012:624: des na dang zhes pa sdud pa'i tshig go //
NK050(wi)012:625: de la rtsa ba'i sngags kyi don ni /
NK050(wi)012:626: zhes bya ba mchog gi tshangs pa /
NK050(wi)012:627: chos kyi dbyings chos kyi sku /
NK050(wi)012:628: yon tan mtha' dag gi nor bu 'dzin pa /
NK050(wi)012:629: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po chos kyi mchog go //
NK050(wi)012:630: chos kyi sku las byung ba'i ye shes ni t+aa re /
NK050(wi)012:631: gdod ma'i chos las byung ba'i sku ni tut+t+aa re /
NK050(wi)012:632: brjod du med pa'i chos las byung ba snying rje
NK050(wi)012:633: chen po ni tu re ste sprul pa dang mdzad
NK050(wi)012:634: pa'o // s+w+aa ni rang byin gyis brlabs pa /
NK050(wi)012:635: h+aa ni ha las +aar l+ai ste /
NK050(wi)012:636: e ma ho rol pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:637: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku dang zhing khams dang mdzad pa mtha' yas pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:638: don de rnams kyis sgo nas bstod pa'i phyir rtsa ba'i sngags kyi bstod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:639: las su bya ba bstod pa'i yul lha mo ste bcom ldan 'das ma la'o //
NK050(wi)012:640: byed pa ni gus pa yang dag par ldan pas so //
NK050(wi)012:641: byed pa po blo ldan gang gis so //
NK050(wi)012:643: 'dir rab tu dad cing brtson 'grus dang ldan pas te /
NK050(wi)012:645: srod dang tho rangs langs pa ste ldang ba yang bar byas nas /
NK050(wi)012:646: phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod par sngon du 'gro bas /
NK050(wi)012:647: 'phags ma'i yon tan yid la dran pas so //
NK050(wi)012:648: de'i phan yon ni mi 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu ster ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:649: 'jigs pa chen po brgyad dang bcu drug la sogs pa 'jigs pa thams cad las skyob pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:650: mi 'jigs pa'i gnas dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:651: 'dir rab dang brjod cing zhes pa la /
NK050(wi)012:652: rgya skad du pa zhes pa yod pas brtson pas klog cing zhes brjod na bade'o //
NK050(wi)012:653: de bas na blo ldan gang gis srod sogs thun
NK050(wi)012:654: drug tu lha mo la gus shing yon tan dran
NK050(wi)012:655: pa'i sgo nas / brtson pas bstod pa 'di bklags na /
NK050(wi)012:656: phan yon 'di dag yod do zhes pa ste gong 'og thams cad du de ltar go bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:657: sdig pa ni sdig pa'i 'bras bu ste /
NK050(wi)012:659: byur chags skal ba ngan pa sngar yod rnams thams
NK050(wi)012:660: cad rab tu zhi zhing slar 'byung bar 'gyur ba
NK050(wi)012:661: rnams bzlog pa'o // de bzhin du sngar sdig pa'i las kyi mthus /
NK050(wi)012:662: ngan 'gror skye nges pa'i las can yin yang /
NK050(wi)012:663: bstod pa bklags pa'i gzi brjid kyis sdig pa'i las
NK050(wi)012:664: zad de ngan 'gro'i skye ba thams cad 'joms pa'i
NK050(wi)012:665: gnas skabs thob pa nyid de /
NK050(wi)012:667: de'i ldog don du bde 'gro'i skye ba phun sum tshogs pa 'grub pa yang bstan te /
NK050(wi)012:668: des ni 'khor ba nyid du yang tshe 'di dang phyi ma'i phan yon gnyis kar bstan no //
NK050(wi)012:669: rgyal ba bye ba sogs la bstod pa bzlas pa dang de'i sgrub pa la gnas pas /
NK050(wi)012:670: bcom ldan 'das ma 'di nyid dang lhan cig tu
NK050(wi)012:671: gshegs shing bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba sangs rgyas sprul pa'i
NK050(wi)012:672: sku bye ba phrag bdun rnams kyis /
NK050(wi)012:673: zhal yang sgrub pa des myur du mthong bar 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)012:674: mthong nas kyang dngos sam rmi lam du de rnams
NK050(wi)012:675: kyis 'od zer ram phyag las bdud rtsi'i rgyun 'bab
NK050(wi)012:677: 'dis ni slob ma smin byed kyi tshe /
NK050(wi)012:678: chu dbang bskur ba yang bstan no //
NK050(wi)012:679: de ltar dbang bskur ba de'i rkyen gyis /
NK050(wi)012:680: sgrib pa mang po ni byang /
NK050(wi)012:681: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi khyad par mang po
NK050(wi)012:682: thob ste 'khor phun sum tshogs pa 'di las ches
NK050(wi)012:683: che ba'i yon tan du ma nyid dang ldan pa'i
NK050(wi)012:684: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub rim gyis thob par
NK050(wi)012:685: 'gyur zhing / de thob nas kyang 'phags pa'i sa rnams bgrod de /
NK050(wi)012:686: mthar thug rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang der 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)012:687: zhes thar pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa thos pa'i phan yon bstan no //
NK050(wi)012:688: gnas skabs sngags kyi mthus phan yon gzhan yang bstan pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:689: tshigs bcad gsum gsungs pa las /
NK050(wi)012:690: de yi dug ni sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:691: brtan pa nag po brtsegs pa la sogs pa'i dug dang /
NK050(wi)012:692: g.yo ba sdig sbrul dang lhog pa dang shu ba la sogs pa'i dug ste /
NK050(wi)012:693: gnas pa zhes pa ni brtan pa dang ming gi
NK050(wi)012:694: rnam grangs su 'gyur ba go bde ba'i phyir gnyis
NK050(wi)012:696: gnyan los brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yang rung zhes pa'am /
NK050(wi)012:698: brtan g.yo gang yang rung ba dag ni /
NK050(wi)012:700: de lta bu'i dug ni drag po chen po ste /
NK050(wi)012:701: srog 'phrog pa dang sdug bsngal tshabs chen bskyed pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:702: de lta bu'i dug de yang sgrol ma'i rig sngags dran pa tsam gyis /
NK050(wi)012:703: rab tu 'jigs pa ste de'i gnod pa rnams sel zhing /
NK050(wi)012:704: bdud rtsi la sogs par 'gyur ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:705: zos pa dang ni 'thungs pa nyid kyang zhes pa ltar na /
NK050(wi)012:706: dran pas rab tu sel zhes pa'i snga rol du sbyar te /
NK050(wi)012:707: dug de lta bu zos pa dang 'thungs pa nyid kyang /
NK050(wi)012:708: reg pa dug can gyi byugs pa sogs kyang rig
NK050(wi)012:709: sngags dran pas skad cig la sel zhes pa'i don
NK050(wi)012:710: yin la / 'gyur gzhan las zos pa dang ni zhes pa 'di /
NK050(wi)012:711: dran pas zhes pa'i tshig gi 'og tu 'don pa ltar na /
NK050(wi)012:712: sho lo ka 'og ma dang sbrel bar 'gro mod /
NK050(wi)012:713: 'on kyang kha di tam p+ai ta me wa b+aa zhes 'byung ba ltar na /
NK050(wi)012:715: gdon dang sogs la gdon rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnod pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:716: rims la sogs pa'i nad dang /
NK050(wi)012:717: dug gis gzir ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi
NK050(wi)012:718: tshogs rang la gnas pa rnams kyang sgrol ba'i rig
NK050(wi)012:719: sngags 'di'i mthus rnam par spangs te /
NK050(wi)012:720: bde ba thob par ma zad /
NK050(wi)012:721: rigs sngags mkhan po des yid kyis bsam pa tsam mam /
NK050(wi)012:722: zhi ba'i las kyi sbyor ba byas pa tsam gyis /
NK050(wi)012:723: sems can gzhan pa rnams la yang sdug bsngal de spong bar byed do //
NK050(wi)012:724: de bzhin du kun gyis tha ma'i tshig rkang yang
NK050(wi)012:725: blangs te bgegs rnams med cing bdud la sogs pa
NK050(wi)012:727: gnyis gsum bdun du sogs la gnyis ni nyin dang mtshan mor brjod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:728: gsum ni nyin dang mtshan la yang rung ste thun gsum mo //
NK050(wi)012:729: de re rer yang sgrub pa dang 'brel bar bstod pa lan bdun bdun du brjod pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:730: bla ma'i man ngag las 'byung ba ltar ro //
NK050(wi)012:731: de ltar brjod na bu ste khyim pa'i phyogs la rigs brgyud dam /
NK050(wi)012:732: rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la ni chos kyi bu
NK050(wi)012:733: slob ma 'dod pas bu'am slob ma mang po dag
NK050(wi)012:735: nor 'dod pas ni nor dang longs spyod rnams nyid thob par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)012:736: gzhan yang zhi ba la sogs pa'i las dang /
NK050(wi)012:737: ril bu dang mig sman dang /
NK050(wi)012:738: ral gri dang gnod sbyin mo dang gter chen po la sogs pa /
NK050(wi)012:739: dngos thub rnam pa sna tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)012:740: 'phags ma sgrol ma la bstod pa /
NK050(wi)012:741: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang
NK050(wi)012:742: mdzad kyis gsungs pa zhes pa la 'di sgrol ma'i
NK050(wi)012:743: rgyud kyi rgyal po rtog pa bdun brgya pa las
NK050(wi)012:745: las sna tshogs pa'i rgyud du grags pa deng sang phyogs 'dir yod pa 'di na'ang snang mod /
NK050(wi)012:746: 'di ni mkhas pa rnams brtsams rgyud yin pas bzhed pa don la gnas pas 'di nas min no //
NK050(wi)012:747: rgyud rgyas pa'ii dum bu dang /
NK050(wi)012:748: bsdus rgyud la sogs pa yin pa'ang mi 'gal lo //
NK050(wi)012:749: rdzogs so ni sa m+aap+ta ste yang dag par thob pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:750: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum gyur la //
NK050(wi)012:751: bstod pa'i rgyud 'di rab bshad las //
NK050(wi)012:752: dge ba gang zhig thob pa des //
NK050(wi)012:754: ces pa phyag 'tshal nyer gcig gis bstod pa'i rnam
NK050(wi)012:755: par bshad pa 'di yang t+aa ra n+aa thas smras
NK050(wi)012:756: pa'o // mchog dngos grub pa'i dbang phyug he ru ka /
NK050(wi)012:757: rig pa 'dzin pa yongs kyi 'khor los bsgyur //
NK050(wi)012:758: gang gi gsung gsang mchog gi dpal bzang po //
NK050(wi)012:759: chos sbyin mi zad bar du bskrun pa'i mthus //
NK050(wi)012:760: bstan dang bstan 'dzin kun gyi mi mthun phyogs //
NK050(wi)012:761: nyer zhi dpal 'byor ye shes rnam par rgyas //
NK050(wi)012:762: chos ldan rgyal po'i chab srid rtag brtan cing //
NK050(wi)012:763: 'gro rnams nyer 'tshe'i gnas bral dge legs 'phel //
NK050(wi)012:764: bdag cag rje btsun myur ma dpa' mo yis //
NK050(wi)012:765: tshe rabs kun tu rjes bzung rnam bzhi yi //
NK050(wi)012:766: yid 'dod re ba'i 'bras bu ma lus pa //
NK050(wi)012:767: myur 'grub dam pa'i snang ba rgyas gyur cing //
NK050(wi)012:768: rdo rje slob dpon mgon bcas 'phags ma'i tshogs //
NK050(wi)012:769: nam yang gtsug gi rgyan du bzhugs gyur cig /
NK050(wi)012:770: ces pa'ang dbon sprul karma rat+nasa so //
NK050(wi)012:774: // // ltung bshags kyi 'grel pa bzhugs so //
NK050(wi)012:775: swa sti sid+d+hi pra dze b+h+yeh sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK050(wi)012:776: 'dir phung po gsum pa'i rgyun bshags kyi don cung zad bshad par bya ste /
NK050(wi)012:777: de yang 'di ni 'phags pa dkon macha ga brtsegs
NK050(wi)012:778: pa chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las
NK050(wi)012:779: / 'dus pa nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhes kyang bya /
NK050(wi)012:780: nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa'i mdo zhes kyang bya ba las 'byung ba yin te /
NK050(wi)012:781: de ni bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu
NK050(wi)012:782: rgyal byed kyi tshal du dge slong lnga brgya dang
NK050(wi)012:783: / byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gcig dang bcas pa dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te /
NK050(wi)012:784: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang /
NK050(wi)012:785: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs
NK050(wi)012:786: sna tshogs pa'i chos skyong bar 'khor rnams la spro
NK050(wi)012:788: de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la sogs
NK050(wi)012:789: pa dngos su smos pa sum cu rtsa brgyad tsam
NK050(wi)012:790: gyis / rang rang gi skal ba dang ma thun par spro bar khas blangs so //
NK050(wi)012:791: de nas sh+aa ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de
NK050(wi)012:792: rnams kyi go cha chen po'i tshul la ngo mtshar
NK050(wi)012:793: skyes pa na / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub
NK050(wi)012:794: sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang thabs mkhas
NK050(wi)012:795: skyes pa na / dang / shes rab dang ye
NK050(wi)012:796: shes kyi yul ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
NK050(wi)012:797: kyi spyod yul ma yin te /
NK050(wi)012:798: sprul pa sna tshogs ston kyang chos nyid las mi g.yo la /
NK050(wi)012:799: gang la gang 'dul gyi sku sna tshogs ston pa sogs mang du gsungs nas /
NK050(wi)012:800: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas /
NK050(wi)012:801: chos dang zang zing sbyin pa gnyis la bslab par bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:802: rab tu byung bas smyu gu dang snag tsha dang
NK050(wi)012:803: glegs bam dang chos sbyin pa la bslab bar bya'o
NK050(wi)012:804: // mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pas /
NK050(wi)012:807: shin tu gtong ba la bslab ces gsungs te /
NK050(wi)012:808: de la gtong ba ni rgyal srid la sogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:809: gtong ba chen po ni bu dang chung ma sogs dang /
NK050(wi)012:810: shin tu gtong ba ni mgo dang rkang lag la sogs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:811: yang sh+aa ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs
NK050(wi)012:812: pa gsum gyis 'jigs sam mi 'jigs zhus pa la
NK050(wi)012:813: / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po ni gnyis so //
NK050(wi)012:814: zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:816: 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i kha na ma tho ba ni /
NK050(wi)012:817: kha na ma tho ba'i ngos nas chung la 'bral bar ni daka'o //
NK050(wi)012:818: zhe sdang dang ldan pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:819: kha na ma tho ba che la 'bral bar ni sla ba yin /
NK050(wi)012:820: gti mug dang ldan pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:821: kha na ma tho ba che la 'bral bar yang dka' ba yin /
NK050(wi)012:822: de'i rgyu mtshan 'dod chags 'khor ba 'dzin pa'i sa bon dang nying mtshams sbyor ba yin /
NK050(wi)012:823: zhe sdang ngan song gi rgyu yin yang spong ba'i rnam pa can yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK050(wi)012:824: gti mug ni mi shes pa'i rang bzhin shin tu 'a grol dka' ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:825: dmyal ba brgyad kyi yang rtsa ba yin no //
NK050(wi)012:826: 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba chen po'i nyes ltung gis phog na /
NK050(wi)012:827: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs pa bcu tshogs la bshags dgos pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:828: rags pa'i lhag ma lta bu 'bring po ni lnga tshogs la bshags dgos pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:829: chags sems kyis lta ba lta bu chung ngu ni gcig gam gnyis la bshags pa yin no //
NK050(wi)012:830: 'dod chags la dngos su de ltar gsungs pa'i shugs la /
NK050(wi)012:831: zhe sdang gti mug gnyis la de'i nyis 'gyur yin par don gyis go bar bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:832: dug gsum gyis kun nas blangs pa'i las che ba mtshams med pa lnga dang /
NK050(wi)012:833: dge 'dun dang mchod rten la sdig bsags pa rnams dang /
NK050(wi)012:834: 'bring po bud med kyi nyes pa la sogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:835: chung ba khye'u dang lag pa'i nyes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:836: mdor na nyes pa lci ba thams cad kyang sangs
NK050(wi)012:837: rgyas sum cu rtsa lnga'i spyan sngar nyin mtshan dus
NK050(wi)012:838: drug tu bshags pas 'dag par 'gyur na /
NK050(wi)012:839: chung ngu dang 'bring po lta smos kyang ci dgos /
NK050(wi)012:840: 'di ni gong du byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyi mdun du bshags par ma nus na yang /
NK050(wi)012:841: sangs rgyas rnams yid kyis dmigs pa'i spyan sngar bshags pas 'dag pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:842: de'i rjes su phung po gsum pa'i bshags pa nyid gsungs nas /
NK050(wi)012:843: sangs rgyas sum cu so lnga po de dag la
NK050(wi)012:844: sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la
NK050(wi)012:845: byed na sdig pa dag par 'gyur la /
NK050(wi)012:846: sdig pa dag pa la zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)012:847: sangs rgyas byang sems rnams ni so so skye bo
NK050(wi)012:848: 'khrul pa can rnams smin par bya ba'i phyir dang
NK050(wi)012:849: mos pa sna tshogs rnams thar pa mchog thob pa'i
NK050(wi)012:850: phyir / smon lam rdzogs par mdzad kyang chos kyi dbyings las g.yo ba med do //
NK050(wi)012:851: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams /
NK050(wi)012:852: snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i mthu las /
NK050(wi)012:853: log par ltung ba'i 'gro ba bzhi po rnams kyi gzugs bzung nas /
NK050(wi)012:854: de rnams smin par mdzad do //
NK050(wi)012:855: bkod pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khyim bdag gi gzugs dang /
NK050(wi)012:856: de bzhin du rim gyis sbyar nas /
NK050(wi)012:857: zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /
NK050(wi)012:858: dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis mos pa ji
NK050(wi)012:859: lta ba'i gzugs ston pa'i bar ting nge 'dzin brgyad
NK050(wi)012:860: gsungs nas / de ltar sngon yang bdag dang sems can du dmigs pa med do //
NK050(wi)012:861: seng ge'i sgra skad byi las bzod par mi nus pa sogs dpe bzhi gsungs nas /
NK050(wi)012:862: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems dpa' mchog dang /
NK050(wi)012:863: dge rtsa'i stobs kyis nyes pa thams cad skad cig
NK050(wi)012:864: gcig la spangs te sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge
NK050(wi)012:866: bshags pa'i yul du byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs dang /
NK050(wi)012:867: thabs mkhas kyi khyad par yin pas /
NK050(wi)012:868: nyan rang rnams kyi spyod yul ma yin la /
NK050(wi)012:869: nyin mtshan dus drug tu sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'dzin cing /
NK050(wi)012:870: phung po gsum pa 'don pa de dag ni /
NK050(wi)012:871: nyes ltung thams cad byang zhing /
NK050(wi)012:872: sangs rgyas mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yang thob par 'gyur ro //
NK050(wi)012:874: de nas 'phags pa nye bar 'khor yang 'khor der 'dus nas /
NK050(wi)012:875: 'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa zhus pas /
NK050(wi)012:876: bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams kyi sbyor ba dang bsam pa yang gzhan /
NK050(wi)012:877: theg chen la zhugs pa rnams kyis sbyor ba dang bsam pa yang gzhan yin te /
NK050(wi)012:878: nyan thos pa rang don kho na la zhugs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:879: 'khor bas 'jigs pa skye ba 'phral du sbyor bar 'dod pa'i tshul khrims de ni /
NK050(wi)012:880: thig chen khas blangs na shin tu tshul khrims 'chal ba yin la /
NK050(wi)012:881: theg chen pa gzhan don du bskal pa mtha' yas pa'i bar du'ang 'khor bar gnas dgos shing /
NK050(wi)012:882: de la dmigs pa'i tshul khrims de ni nyan thos
NK050(wi)012:883: blangs na nyan thos theg pa kho na la ltos
NK050(wi)012:884: pa'i ltung ba chen por 'dzin no //
NK050(wi)012:885: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:886: rjes su bsrung ba dang bcas pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:887: sems can rnams kyi sems dang mthun par 'jug pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:888: nyan thos rnams kyis ma yin no //
NK050(wi)012:889: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bslab pa ni bcos su yod pa yin te /
NK050(wi)012:890: snga dro'i tshe nyes pa byung yang gung tshigs kyi
NK050(wi)012:891: dus thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ma 'bral bas
NK050(wi)012:892: gnas na / tshul khrims kyi phung po ma zad
NK050(wi)012:893: pa kho na yin pa sogs thun mtshams thams cad
NK050(wi)012:894: gnas na / la sbyar nas / ha cang 'gyod par mi bya ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:895: nyan thos kyi theg pa la ltung ba yang yang byung na /
NK050(wi)012:896: tshul khrims yongs su zad par 'gyur ba yin la /
NK050(wi)012:897: khams gsum gyi nyon mongs 'phral du spangs nas /
NK050(wi)012:898: rang don myang 'das myur du thob par byed dgos pa'i phyir bslab pa bcos su med pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:899: yang byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub kyi sems spangs na /
NK050(wi)012:900: bskal pa mtha' yas par 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas brtse bar byed kyang /
NK050(wi)012:901: tshul khrims rnam par dag pa kho na nyid de /
NK050(wi)012:902: rmi lam na yang nyon mongs pas reg par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:903: bslab pa ring du rjes su zhugs pa zhes bya la /
NK050(wi)012:904: nyan thos rnams 'bras bu chung ngu de 'phral du thob pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:905: lam chung ngu la brtson 'grus myur du 'jug dgos
NK050(wi)012:906: pas bslab pa mthar chags pa ste ma 'dres par
NK050(wi)012:908: de yang rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni tshegs chen pos sgrub dgos pa yin pas /
NK050(wi)012:909: sdug bsngal skyo ba dang chags bral ba gcig tu
NK050(wi)012:910: phyogs pa tsam gyis 'grub par mi 'gyur ba sogs
NK050(wi)012:911: gsungs so // de nas nye ba 'khor gyis nyes pa lci yang zhus pa la /
NK050(wi)012:912: theg chen kho na'i dbang du byas nas /
NK050(wi)012:913: 'dod chags dang mtshungs ldan gyi nyes pa dus mtha'
NK050(wi)012:914: yas par byung ba las kyang zhe sdang dang mtshungs
NK050(wi)012:915: ldan gyi nyes pa lan gcig byung ba yang lci
NK050(wi)012:916: ste / zhe sdang ni sems can gtong ba yin /
NK050(wi)012:917: 'dod chags ni sems can sdud pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)012:918: de bzhin du 'bral ba bul ba ste 'bral dka' yang /
NK050(wi)012:919: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa chung ba de ni /
NK050(wi)012:920: byang chub sems dpa' la nyon mongs par mi che la /
NK050(wi)012:921: 'bral ba myur yang kha na ma tho ba dang
NK050(wi)012:922: bcas pa che ba de ni de las ldog pa
NK050(wi)012:924: byang sems thabs mi mkhas pa de 'dod chags la 'jigs shing zhe sdang la mi 'jigs la /
NK050(wi)012:925: thabs mkhas pa ni de las ldog pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:926: de nas 'phags pa 'jam dpal 'khor der 'dus nas /
NK050(wi)012:927: dul ba'i chos la 'dul ba ci zhig mchi zhes zhus pa la /
NK050(wi)012:928: chos thams cad shin tu dul ba yin yang de
NK050(wi)012:929: ltar mi shes pa la 'dul ba yang yang bstan
NK050(wi)012:930: zhes gsungs te / nyon mongs rang bzhin gyis med kyang de ltar ma shes pa la /
NK050(wi)012:931: 'dul ba bstan zhes pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:932: de nas nye bar 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das brgyud nas 'jam dpal chos ston par bskul /
NK050(wi)012:933: 'jam dpal gyis kyang sems rang bzhin gyis dul ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:936: nam mkha'i mtha' la gnas pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:937: dus gsum mi dmigs pa la sogs pa stong pa nyid kyi don bshad nas /
NK050(wi)012:938: chos nyid 'di la mi mos na bslab pa las ring du gyur zhes bshad do //
NK050(wi)012:939: de nas nye ba 'khor gyis 'jam dpal ni chos
NK050(wi)012:940: gang ston yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa las brtsams
NK050(wi)012:941: te ston no // zhes zhus pa la /
NK050(wi)012:942: ston pas bsam mi khyab la ma brten na rnam par grol ba med pas /
NK050(wi)012:943: 'jam dpal yang rtog pa thams cad spangs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:944: lhag pa'i nga rgyal spangs pa'i phyir chos ston no //
NK050(wi)012:945: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa bden par zhen pas spong sems dang /
NK050(wi)012:946: rnam par byang ba'i chos la bden par zhen nas thob 'dod dang /
NK050(wi)012:949: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba la bden zhen gyis dbye 'byed dang /
NK050(wi)012:950: tha na bsam par bya ba ci yang med do //
NK050(wi)012:952: de thams cad lhag pa'i nga rgyal spyod pa yin cing /
NK050(wi)012:953: bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid la mngon par ma
NK050(wi)012:954: zhen na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med do zhes gsungs
NK050(wi)012:955: / de nas ston pas ched du brjod pa'i tshul gyis tshigs bcad rgyas par gsungs te /
NK050(wi)012:956: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas dang /
NK050(wi)012:957: de nyid la mngon par zhen pa med pa ba'i tshul de nyid /
NK050(wi)012:958: gzhi lam 'bras gsum gyi chos thams cad la sbyar nas /
NK050(wi)012:959: gdams pa dang bcas te zab rgyas su gsungs so //
NK050(wi)012:961: shes rab chos rnams shes par gyis shig ces //
NK050(wi)012:962: shes rab lhag mthong blo gros blo brten yang //
NK050(wi)012:963: rang bzhin rang bzhin med pa nam du yang //
NK050(wi)012:964: shes par mi nus de yang nges par bstan //
NK050(wi)012:965: zhes rang bzhin yod med kyi dbye ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:966: sems dmyal 'jigs pa nga yis bstan byas te //
NK050(wi)012:967: sems can stong phrag du ma skyo bas kyang //
NK050(wi)012:968: gang dag shi 'phos ngan song drag 'gro ba'i //
NK050(wi)012:969: 'gro ba de dag nam yang yod ma yin //
NK050(wi)012:970: zhes pas gang zag gi bdag med pa gtso bor bstan cing /
NK050(wi)012:971: gang dag ral gri mda' chen mtshon 'dzin pa'i //
NK050(wi)012:972: gnod pa byed pa yod pa ma yin te //
NK050(wi)012:973: rtog pa'i dbang gis ngan song de dag na //
NK050(wi)012:974: lus la babs mthong de na mtshon cha med //
NK050(wi)012:975: ces phyi rol gyi don med cing sems su bstan pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:976: sna tshogs yid dga' me tog kha phye zhing //
NK050(wi)012:977: gser gyi khang mchog 'bar ba yid 'ong ba //
NK050(wi)012:978: 'di na de la'ang byed pa 'ga' med de //
NK050(wi)012:979: de dag rtog pa'i dbang gis bzhag pa yin //
NK050(wi)012:980: zhes byed po gzhan med kyi rtog pa nyid yin pas /
NK050(wi)012:981: snang ba de yang sems las gzhan min no zhes pa'i don dang /
NK050(wi)012:982: rtog pa'i dbang gis 'jig rten rnams btags te //
NK050(wi)012:983: 'du shes 'dzin pas byis pa rnam par phye //
NK050(wi)012:984: 'dzin dang 'dzin med de yang byung min te //
NK050(wi)012:985: yongs su rtog pa sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin //
NK050(wi)012:986: zhes gzung 'dzin gnyis ka med par bstan no //
NK050(wi)012:987: kun gzhir ma gyur mya ngan 'das pa thob //
NK050(wi)012:988: mkha' 'dra chos rnams 'di dag shes gyur na //
NK050(wi)012:989: zhing brgya rnams su thogs med 'gro 'gyur zhing //
NK050(wi)012:990: zhes sogs kun gzhi rnam shes spangs na mthar thug yin pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:991: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rtog pa'i yon tan yang gsungs so //
NK050(wi)012:992: de nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gsungs pas /
NK050(wi)012:993: dge slong lhag pa'i nga rgyal can gnyis brgyad dgra bcom pa thob pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:994: sems dpa' drug khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo //
NK050(wi)012:995: de'i rjes su mdo 'di'i mtshan gyi rnam grangs bshad pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:996: 'khor rnams dga' zhing yi rang ba'i bar du yang yod do //
NK050(wi)012:997: de ltar rgyun bshags 'di nyid gang las 'byung ba'i mdo'i bzhugs tshul bkod pas /
NK050(wi)012:998: theg pa che chung gi nyes ltung gi khyad par dang /
NK050(wi)012:999: theg chen nyid kyi ltung ba lci yang dang /
NK050(wi)012:1000: mthar thug rdzogs par 'gyur mi 'gyur gyi khyad par
NK050(wi)012:1001: sogs rmad du byung ba'i chos la nges pa rnyed
NK050(wi)012:1002: par 'gyur ro // da ni rgyun bshags kyi gzhung dngos la 'jug par bya ste /
NK050(wi)012:1005: bla na med pa'i mchod pa rnam pa bdun po dag gis bsdus pa yin no //
NK050(wi)012:1007: dang po la 'ga' zhig bshags pa yi rang bsngo ba'i phung po gsum du 'chad la /
NK050(wi)012:1011: gsol 'debs kyi phung po zhes 'chad do //
NK050(wi)012:1014: yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po gsum la ngos 'dzin
NK050(wi)012:1015: pa nyid gzhung gi tshig don dum bur 'byed pa'i
NK050(wi)012:1016: dbang du byas na legs par mthong ste /
NK050(wi)012:1017: de ltar na ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag
NK050(wi)012:1018: 'tshal lo yan chad phyag 'tshal ba'i phung po dang
NK050(wi)012:1019: / dgongs su gsol nas slan chad kyang sdom par
NK050(wi)012:1020: bgyi lags so yan chad sdig pa bshags pa'i phung
NK050(wi)012:1021: / po dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
NK050(wi)012:1022: dag thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes pa
NK050(wi)012:1023: man chad yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po yin no
NK050(wi)012:1024: / po dang / // 'di la dgongs gsol gnyis
NK050(wi)012:1025: kyang don tshan phyi ma'i so so'i 'go rtsom byed
NK050(wi)012:1027: gzhung tshig sde tshan gsum po mang nyung ches mi
NK050(wi)012:1028: snyoms pa med pa sogs kyi lugs 'di legs par
NK050(wi)012:1029: mthong ste / thog ma'i skyabs 'gro ni yon tan dran pa'i phyir byung ba yin pas /
NK050(wi)012:1030: phyag 'tshal ba'i sde tshan yin la /
NK050(wi)012:1031: bshags pa 'og ma man chad rnam grangs gzhan gyi sgo nas bstan pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1032: gnyis pa stobs bzhi'i bsdu tshul 'chad tshul la /
NK050(wi)012:1033: 'chad tshul mi 'dra ba mang du snang yang /
NK050(wi)012:1034: bsdus pa'i don 'di ltar bya ste /
NK050(wi)012:1036: bshags pa'i yan lag stobs bzhi bshad pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1038: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las zhes pa nas /
NK050(wi)012:1039: 'jug pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am zhes pa'i bar dang /
NK050(wi)012:1040: de dag gi spyan sngar sogs dang /
NK050(wi)012:1041: sdig pa thams cad ni so sor bshags so zhes pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1042: gnyis pa la rten gyi stobs /
NK050(wi)012:1043: gnyen po kun tu spyod pa'i stobs /
NK050(wi)012:1048: phyag 'tshal gyi yul du gyur pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la /
NK050(wi)012:1049: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ye shes su gyur pa sogs so //
NK050(wi)012:1050: rang rgyud la dgos pa'i rten gyi stobs ni /
NK050(wi)012:1051: thog mtha'i skyabs 'gro gnyis yin la /
NK050(wi)012:1052: bsngo ba'i khong gi sems bskyed kyang der bsdu'o //
NK050(wi)012:1053: gnyen po kun tu spyod pa'i stobs ni /
NK050(wi)012:1057: yongs su bsngo ba snga phyi gnyis so //
NK050(wi)012:1059: las kyi sgrib pa gang gis sogs /
NK050(wi)012:1061: slan chad kyang gcod cing sdom par bgyid lags so //
NK050(wi)012:1063: gsum pa ni dngos su ma tshang yang bshad yam tsam mam /
NK050(wi)012:1064: don gyi stobs sbyar na 'gal ba med pas de ltar sbyar na /
NK050(wi)012:1065: ri dbang gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa yan chad phyag 'tshal ba'i yan lag dang /
NK050(wi)012:1066: de rjes nas bsdam par bgyid lags so zhes pa yan chad sdig pa bshags pa'i yan lag dang /
NK050(wi)012:1067: bdag gis kyang yongs su bsngo bar bagyi'o zhes pa yan chad bsngo ba'i yan lag dang /
NK050(wi)012:1068: bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ngo
NK050(wi)012:1069: zhes pa yan chad yi rang ba'i yan lag yin
NK050(wi)012:1070: la / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol 'debs so
NK050(wi)012:1071: zhes pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba
NK050(wi)012:1072: la / 'debs pa dang / mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa gnyis bstan cing /
NK050(wi)012:1074: bsngo ba'i khong gi sems bskyed kyang bsnan nas phyag 'tshal bshags pa yi rang gsol 'debs /
NK050(wi)012:1075: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed bsngo ba ste /
NK050(wi)012:1076: yan lag bdun gyi bgrang tshul 'di bzhin du byas na rung tsam mo //
NK050(wi)012:1077: 'on kyang tshig don dang 'brel ba'i don bsdu la
NK050(wi)012:1078: sbyor na yan lag bdun du bgrang pa mi legs
NK050(wi)012:1079: te / sems bskyed bsngo ba las gzhan du ma dmigs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1080: go rim yang 'chol bar gnas pas so //
NK050(wi)012:1081: bsngo ba'i khong gi sems bskyed sogs rten dang dkar
NK050(wi)012:1082: po sa bon gyi stobs la mtshungs so snyam na
NK050(wi)012:1083: ma yin te / cha tshang bar bya ba'i phyir 'phros don du de ltar bshad kyi /
NK050(wi)012:1085: dkar po sa bon yi rang sogs rkang thub kyi gzhung yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)012:1086: spyir mdo lugs kyi yan lag bdun pa phal cher la mchod pa yod cing /
NK050(wi)012:1087: gsol 'debs gnyis so sor bgrang ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:1088: skyabs 'gro sems bskyed mi bgrang ba mang bar snang bas /
NK050(wi)012:1089: 'dir yan lag bdun pa tshang bar rtsib nges par dgos pa min la /
NK050(wi)012:1090: kha cig skyabs 'gros mchod pa don gyi 'phangs pas de bgrang bar 'dod pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:1091: dngos bstan bor nas shugs bstan 'tshol ba phongs pa'i rgyu nyid do //
NK050(wi)012:1092: da ni tshig don cung zad brjod par bya ste /
NK050(wi)012:1093: de yang gzhung 'di'i don la dbye na /
NK050(wi)012:1094: phung po gsum rgyas par bstan pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1095: rgyun bshags mdor bsdus pas bshad pa'i /
NK050(wi)012:1098: sdig pa bshags pa'i phung po /
NK050(wi)012:1099: yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po bshad pa gsum las /
NK050(wi)012:1100: dang po la byed pa po rang gi don /
NK050(wi)012:1102: byed pa phyag 'tshal ba dngos te gsum las /
NK050(wi)012:1104: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba zhes pa la byang
NK050(wi)012:1105: chub tu sems bskyed pa skyes bu bdag nyid kyi
NK050(wi)012:1107: gang rang gi ming gsal bar mi brjod pa de la ni /
NK050(wi)012:1108: nyes pa sbed pa'i bsam pa yod srid pas de dgag par bya ba'i phyir bya'o //
NK050(wi)012:1110: dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan rtogs pas de gsum
NK050(wi)012:1111: skyabs kyi yul du shes shing de nyid dran pas
NK050(wi)012:1113: sangs rgyas la skyabs su mchi'o sogs la /
NK050(wi)012:1114: chos spyod 'di ni las dang po pa dang mos
NK050(wi)012:1115: spyod man chad kyi byang chub sems dpas bsgrub pa'i
NK050(wi)012:1117: gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi skyabs yul so sor dbye ba mi byed de /
NK050(wi)012:1118: sangs rgyas ni sku gsum gyis bsdus pa dngos dang btags pa ba thams cad do //
NK050(wi)012:1119: chos ni dam pa'i chos lung dang rtogs pas bsdus pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:1120: rtogs pa de yang lam dang 'bras bu'am /
NK050(wi)012:1121: 'gog lam gyis bsdus pa thams cad do //
NK050(wi)012:1122: dge 'dun ni phyir mi ldog gis thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtso bor yin la /
NK050(wi)012:1123: skabs 'dir nyan rang 'phags pa rnams kyang zhor byung du ni yin te /
NK050(wi)012:1124: byang chub sems dpa' so skye sa ma thob pa'i
NK050(wi)012:1125: spangs pa dang rtogs pa'i rigs nyan rang 'phags pa
NK050(wi)012:1126: rnams kyis thob pa mang du yod pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:1127: yon tan de dag gi phyogs nas bla mar gyur pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1128: de dag sgrub pa'i phyir yang skyabs su 'gro ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:1129: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni mkhyen pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1131: nus mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1132: chos kyi yon tan 'bras bu'i chos ni skyon thams cad spangs shing yon tan rdzogs pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1133: lam gyis ni sgrib gnyis spong zhing phun sum tshogs pa thob par byed pa dang /
NK050(wi)012:1134: de dag rnams ma rtogs pa rtogs par byed pa lung gi chos la rags las pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1135: dge 'dun gyi yon tan lam gyi chos de dag
NK050(wi)012:1136: rgyud la skyes pas skyon mang po spangs shing yon
NK050(wi)012:1137: tan du ma dang ldan pa /
NK050(wi)012:1138: snying rje chen pos sems can sgrol ba la brtson pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1139: de'i phyir dkon mchog gsum po de dag skyabs su 'os shing phyag 'tshal bar 'os pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1141: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK050(wi)012:1142: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa la phyag 'tshal
NK050(wi)012:1143: lo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:1144: chos nyid ma nor bar gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa /
NK050(wi)012:1145: bdud bzhi bcom pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa /
NK050(wi)012:1146: chos thams cad ma rig pa'i snang ba sangs shing
NK050(wi)012:1147: ye shes kyi snang ba rgyas pa'i phyir yang dag
NK050(wi)012:1148: pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so //
NK050(wi)012:1149: sh+aakya ni nus pa'i bdag nyid te /
NK050(wi)012:1150: mthu dang snying stobs phun sum tshogs pa /
NK050(wi)012:1151: thub pa ni dgra thub pa ste sgrib gnyis bag chags dang bcas pa spangs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1152: mdo'i dpe nyid la de tsam snang la /
NK050(wi)012:1153: deng sang phal cher 'don pa ltar na /
NK050(wi)012:1154: bcom ldan 'das dang dpal rgyal ba zhes pa'i tshig kyang snon pas /
NK050(wi)012:1155: skal pa drug gi phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pas bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK050(wi)012:1156: rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa grub pas dpal dang /
NK050(wi)012:1157: mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad las rgyal bas rgyal ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:1161: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pas rab tu
NK050(wi)012:1162: 'joms pa ste rdo rje snying por rab tu 'joms
NK050(wi)012:1163: pa'o // ma rig pa sel ba'i phyir rin chen 'od 'aphro'o //
NK050(wi)012:1164: chos dbyings rgya mtsho'i bdag po yin pa'i phyir /
NK050(wi)012:1166: mi mthun pa'i phyogs mtha' dag 'joms pa'i phyir dbang po'i sde'o //
NK050(wi)012:1167: de dang 'dra ba las chos kyi dga' bas dgyes pa las dpal dgyes so //
NK050(wi)012:1168: rin po che ltar mi 'gyur zhing gzhan gyi nyon mongs sreg pas rin chen me'o //
NK050(wi)012:1169: gdul bya'i ma yin pa'i mun pa sel ba'i phyir rin chen zla 'od do //
NK050(wi)012:1170: gang gi des chos bstan pa'i rkyen gyis chos mthong
NK050(wi)012:1171: ba thams cad byang chub mchog gi don la the
NK050(wi)012:1172: tshom med par sbyor ba'i phyir mthong ba don yod
NK050(wi)012:1173: do // thugs rje chen po'i bsil zer spro ba'i phyir rin chen zla ba'o //
NK050(wi)012:1174: mthong ba dang sgom pa spangs par bya ba'i sgrib
NK050(wi)012:1175: pa'i dri ma thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dri ma
NK050(wi)012:1176: med pa'o // sgrib pa thams cad 'joms pas dpa'
NK050(wi)012:1177: bar gyur pa'i ye shes sems can thams cad la
NK050(wi)012:1178: sbyin par mdzad pa'i phyir dpa' sbyin no //
NK050(wi)012:1179: sgrib pa spangs pas gtsang ba'i phyir tshangs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1180: gdul bya mtha' yas pa sems bskyed du bcug pa'i phyir na /
NK050(wi)012:1181: sangs rgyas mang po bskyed cing sprul par song bas byed pa po tshangs pa dang 'dra ste /
NK050(wi)012:1182: des byin pa ste bskyed pas na bskyed bya'i ming skyed pa por btags pa tshangs pas byin no //
NK050(wi)012:1183: sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags khong khro nga rgyal
NK050(wi)012:1184: ma rig pa lta ba ngan pa dang the tshom
NK050(wi)012:1185: gyi me 'jil zhing dri ma 'khrud par mdzad pa'i
NK050(wi)012:1186: phyir chu lha'o // de dang 'dra ba las lha'i yang lhar gyur pas na chu lha'i lha'o //
NK050(wi)012:1187: gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal dang /
NK050(wi)012:1188: rang nyid kyi dri ma thams cad spangs pas bzang po ste dpal bzang ngo //
NK050(wi)012:1189: 'khor ba'i gdung ba sel bar mdzad pas tsan dan dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1190: sku'i 'od zer gyis zhing khams thams cad 'gengs par mdzad pa'i phyir gzi brjid mtha' yas so //
NK050(wi)012:1191: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par dag pa'i dpal dang ldan pa'i phyir 'od dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1192: sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung gi mya ngan med pa'i phyir mya ngan med pa'i dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1193: n+aa ra ya na zhes sred med kyi bu ste /
NK050(wi)012:1194: de la sred med ni gzhan gyi rgol ba'i 'gran zla med pa /
NK050(wi)012:1195: bu ni rigs kyi don te /
NK050(wi)012:1196: zla med pa'i rigs kyi phyir sred med kyi bu'o //
NK050(wi)012:1197: yang na de'i skad dod n+aa ra yan mi'i theg pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:1198: rang stobs kyis ma nor bar lam la 'jug pa
NK050(wi)012:1199: khyogs la sogs pa mi'i bzhon pa dang 'dra ba
NK050(wi)012:1200: yin no // 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid du
NK050(wi)012:1201: 'ong ba me tog dang 'dra bar chos ston par
NK050(wi)012:1202: mdzad pa ni me tog dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1203: gdug bya rnams tshangs pa'i 'khor lo ste /
NK050(wi)012:1204: chos kyi 'khor lo ye shes snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer dang /
NK050(wi)012:1205: rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol ba dang /
NK050(wi)012:1206: mngon shes mtha' yas pa'i phyir tshangs pa'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1207: gzhan de dang 'dra ba las tshangs pa zhes pa'i
NK050(wi)012:1208: gnas su nyes pa'i skyon gyis ma gos pa pad+ma
NK050(wi)012:1209: zhes pa ste / pad+ma'i 'od zer rnam par rol pa mngon par mkhyen pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1210: 'dir rnam par rol pa ni cho 'phrul rnam pa gsum mo zhes 'chad pa'ang legs par snang ngo //
NK050(wi)012:1211: 'phags pa'i nor bdun gyi dpal gyis phyug par mdzad pas nor dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1212: dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi'i chos kyi dpal gyis khyab par mdzad pas dran pa'i dpal lo //
NK050(wi)012:1213: bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mtshan dang dpe byad
NK050(wi)012:1214: kyi dpal dang ldan pa'i chos rgya cher sgrog par
NK050(wi)012:1215: mdzad pas mtshan dpal shin tu yongs bsgrags so //
NK050(wi)012:1216: dbang po lnga dang mngon shes drug gi tog dang
NK050(wi)012:1217: ldan pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan la dbang sgyur ba'i
NK050(wi)012:1218: phyir dbang po tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'o
NK050(wi)012:1219: // 'gro ba mtha' dag gi gnod pa las nyon
NK050(wi)012:1220: sdug bsngal gyis bsdus pa thams cad gnon cing 'joms
NK050(wi)012:1221: pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par gnon pa'i dpal lo
NK050(wi)012:1222: // // bdud zhi'i g.yul las rgyal ba'i thabs ston
NK050(wi)012:1223: pa'i phyir g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba'o
NK050(wi)012:1224: // // // 'jig rten gyi gnod pa rnams bcom
NK050(wi)012:1225: zhing ches cher gnon pa'i chos rtogs su 'jug pas
NK050(wi)012:1226: gshegs pa'i phyir rnam par gnon pas gshegs pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1227: rnam par dag cing 'od 'phro ba'i zhing khams rgya
NK050(wi)012:1228: chen po ston pa'i phyir kun nas snang ba bkod
NK050(wi)012:1229: pa'i dpal lo // 'gro ba'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'i phyir phrin las rin po che dang /
NK050(wi)012:1230: ye shes kyi 'dab ma rgyas pa'i pad+mas bdud dang
NK050(wi)012:1231: mu stegs zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir rin chen pad+mas
NK050(wi)012:1233: rin chen pad+ma de dang 'dra ba las ye shes dang mdzad pa de la rab tu bzhugs pa /
NK050(wi)012:1234: gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos gang gis kyang bskyod du
NK050(wi)012:1235: med pas ri dbang gi rgyal po lta bu ste
NK050(wi)012:1236: / rin po che'i pad+ma la rab tu bzhugs pa ri dbang gi rgyal po'o //
NK050(wi)012:1237: de dag las thog mtha' gnyis la che ba rgyas par sbyar ba thams cad la go zhing /
NK050(wi)012:1238: nyer bzhi pa dang nyer lnga pa gnyis pa che
NK050(wi)012:1239: brjod bsdus pa mdzad pa yang stod smad rnams su
NK050(wi)012:1240: go ba dang / gzhan rnam che ba'i tshig med par mtshan rkyang brjod pa bsdus pa ste /
NK050(wi)012:1241: gzhan la'ang go bar bya ba yin mod /
NK050(wi)012:1242: bsdus par brjod pa la yang /
NK050(wi)012:1243: thog ma la ni che ba'i tshig nges par brjod dgos so //
NK050(wi)012:1244: skabs 'dir yang na slob dpon dpa' bos mdzad par
NK050(wi)012:1245: grags pa'i bstod pa ltar mtshan don bshad kyang rung
NK050(wi)012:1246: ste / de dang de la mtshan ni 'jig rten du grags pa ltar yin gyi /
NK050(wi)012:1247: mtshan gyi don ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ci yang rung ba thams cad kyi yon tan no //
NK050(wi)012:1248: gnyis pa bshags pa'i phung po ni /
NK050(wi)012:1249: de dag la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes pa nas /
NK050(wi)012:1251: zhes pa'i bar de bshags pa'i yul ngos bzung ba /
NK050(wi)012:1252: bshags bya'i nyes byas bstan pa /
NK050(wi)012:1253: ji ltar bshags pa'i tshul gsum mo //
NK050(wi)012:1256: sangs rgyas sum cu rtsa lnga po de dag la sogs pa zhes sbyar zhing /
NK050(wi)012:1257: ji snyed ces pa mang po'i tshig go //
NK050(wi)012:1258: 'tsho zhing gzhes pa ni da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kho na ste /
NK050(wi)012:1259: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas ni /
NK050(wi)012:1260: 'jig rten phal pa rnams kyi blo ngor bshags pa'i yul du mi 'dod pa'i phyir ma smos pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1261: nges par na kun rdzob rnam par gzhag pa la yang /
NK050(wi)012:1262: sngon gyi sangs rgyas da ltar mngon sum du bzhugs pa yin la /
NK050(wi)012:1264: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas su gdags pa thams cad
NK050(wi)012:1265: ngo bo dbye ba med cing dus gsum las 'das
NK050(wi)012:1266: pa'ang yin no // gnyis pa ni /
NK050(wi)012:1267: glegs bam 'ga' zhig las skye ba thog ma'i tha
NK050(wi)012:1268: ma ma mchis pa zhes 'byung ba legs par mngon
NK050(wi)012:1269: te / sngon gyi mtha' med pa'i dus nas zhes pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK050(wi)012:1270: thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa zhes pa ltar na'ang /
NK050(wi)012:1271: don de kho na bzhin du 'chad dgos te /
NK050(wi)012:1272: de gnyis don gcig ming gi rnam grangs su byas nas /
NK050(wi)012:1274: tha ma ste sngon gyi mtha' ma mchis pa zhes sbyor dgos te /
NK050(wi)012:1275: tha ma ni mtha' yin pa las phyi mtha' ma yin par sngon mtha' yin pa'i don no //
NK050(wi)012:1276: spyir nas dus gsum gyi dge ba la yi rang
NK050(wi)012:1277: bsngo ba 'byung bas blo sbyong ba'i don du ma
NK050(wi)012:1278: 'ongs pa'i sdig pa bshags pa'ang mi 'gal mod /
NK050(wi)012:1280: 'khor ba na zhes pa 'khor ba'i gnas na ste /
NK050(wi)012:1281: der ji ltar 'khor ba'i tshul skye gnas bzhi'i skye
NK050(wi)012:1282: bas 'gro ba rigs lnga po gzhan dang gzhan dag
NK050(wi)012:1283: tu skye ba'i tshe zhes sbyar nas /
NK050(wi)012:1284: sdig pa mi dge ba'i las rnams las bgyis pa ni rang gi dngos su byas pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1285: bgyid du rtsal ba ni gzhan byed du bcug pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1286: rjes su yi rang ba ni gzhan gyis byas pa la dga' ba sgom zhing basngagasa pa brjod pa'o //
NK050(wi)012:1287: mchod rten ni sgra yangs par na /
NK050(wi)012:1288: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi rten du grags pa thams cad do //
NK050(wi)012:1289: dge 'dun gyi dkor ni gnas gzhi gcig tu gnas pa'i dge 'dun gyi rdzas dang /
NK050(wi)012:1290: phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor ni /
NK050(wi)012:1291: gzhi na gnas pa dang phyogs thams cad nas nges
NK050(wi)012:1292: med du yong ba kun gyi dus su 'byung ba'am
